text: Welcome to our YouTube channel.

I'm Viviane Clay, director of
the Thousand Brains Project.

For the past 20 years at Numenta,
we've been trying to reverse

engineer the neocortex based on
what we know from neuroscience.

And about three years ago, we
felt like we crossed the threshold

where we could start building a
system based on these principles.

Since then, it has been an
internal project at Numenta.

In June 2024, we got a grant from the
Gates Foundation, and we decided to
make the project fully open source.

As part of that, we want to start
releasing our meeting recordings
again, as Numenta used to do.

Besides the current meeting recordings,
we also want to publish our past meeting

recordings, to give you some idea
of how we got to where we are today.
This is no small feat.

We have over 200 hours
of meeting recordings.

As we sorted through these
recordings, we decided to group
them roughly into three categories.
First, we have core meetings.

These are more polished
presentations and key milestones
in the project's development.

At the beginning of each video,
I'll give you a quick introduction

with a bit of context that you
might need to follow along smoothly.
Second, we have brainstorming meetings.

Those are pretty unpolished, unedited,
and they give you a chance to be a fly
on the wall of our research meetings.

And third, we have review meetings where
we go through other people's research and
review topics related to this project.

We'll start posting videos in these three
categories on a regular basis from now on.

Let us know what you think of this
organization and also just comment

on any other feedback you have or
content that you would like to see.

Also don't forget to subscribe to this
YouTube channel so you get notified

when we post videos and follow us on
social media like Twitter or LinkedIn.
Looking forward to seeing you soon.
Cheers!
